title: CrowdStrike to Acquire Application Intelligence Startup Bionic
description:
The cash-and-stock transaction provides capabilities for CrowdStrike to beef up its enterprise cloud security portfolio.

The post CrowdStrike to Acquire Application Intelligence Startup Bionic appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: HiddenLayer Raises Hefty $50M Round for AI Security Tech
description:
Texas startup attracts major investor interest to build an MLMDR (machine learning detection and response) technology.

The post HiddenLayer Raises Hefty $50M Round for AI Security Tech appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Venafi Leverages Generative AI to Manage Machine Identities
description:
Venafi launched a proprietary generative AI model to help with the mammoth, complex, and expanding problem of managing machine identities.

The post Venafi Leverages Generative AI to Manage Machine Identities appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: ‘Cybersecurity Incident’ Hits ICC
description:
The International Criminal Court was hit by what it called "anomalous activity" regarding its IT systems and that it was currently responding to this "cybersecurity incident."

The post ‘Cybersecurity Incident’ Hits ICC appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Clorox Blames Damaging Cyberattack for Product Shortage
description:
Clorox says the recent cyberattack has been contained, but production is still not fully restored and there is a short supply of products. 

The post Clorox Blames Damaging Cyberattack for Product Shortage appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Alcion Raises $21 Million for Backup-as-a-Service Platform
description:
Data management startup Alcion has raised $21 million in a Series A funding round led by Veeam to expand its market presence.

The post Alcion Raises $21 Million for Backup-as-a-Service Platform appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Pakistani APT Uses YouTube-Mimicking RAT to Spy on Android Devices
description:
New versions of Pakistan-linked APT Transparent Tribe’s CapraRAT Android trojan mimic the appearance of YouTube.

The post Pakistani APT Uses YouTube-Mimicking RAT to Spy on Android Devices appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Thousands of Juniper Appliances Vulnerable to New Exploit
description:
VulnCheck details a new fileless exploit targeting a recent Junos OS vulnerability that thousands of devices have not been patched against.

The post Thousands of Juniper Appliances Vulnerable to New Exploit  appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Trend Micro Patches Exploited Zero-Day Vulnerability in Endpoint Security Products
description:
Trend Micro has patched CVE-2023-41179, an Apex One zero-day code execution vulnerability that has been exploited in attacks. 

The post Trend Micro Patches Exploited Zero-Day Vulnerability in Endpoint Security Products appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Hacker Conversations: Casey Ellis, Hacker and Ringmaster at Bugcrowd
description:
SecurityWeek interviews Casey Ellis, founder, chairman and CTO at Bugcrowd, best known for operating bug bounty programs for organizations.

The post Hacker Conversations: Casey Ellis, Hacker and Ringmaster at Bugcrowd appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Chinese Hackers Target North American, APAC Firms in Web Skimmer Campaign
description:
A Chinese threat actor has been observed targeting organizations in multiple industries to deploy web skimmers on online payment pages.

The post Chinese Hackers Target North American, APAC Firms in Web Skimmer Campaign appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: CISA Says Owl Labs Vulnerabilities Requiring Close Physical Range Exploited in Attacks
description:
CISA says Owl Labs video conferencing device vulnerabilities that require the attacker to be in close range exploited in attacks

The post CISA Says Owl Labs Vulnerabilities Requiring Close Physical Range Exploited in Attacks appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Cybersecurity M&A Roundup for First Half of September 2023
description:
A dozen cybersecurity-related M&A deals were announced in the first half of September 2023.

The post Cybersecurity M&A Roundup for First Half of September 2023 appeared first on SecurityWeek.
